00020 
00021 static void ob_radii2(const SlaterDet* Q,
00022           const Gaussian*G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00023           const GaussianAux* X, complex double r2[3])
00024 {
00025   complex double mr2;
00026   int A=Q->A, Z=Q->Z, N=Q->N;
00027 
00028   mr2 = (3.0*X->alpha + X->rho2)* X->Q;
00029  
00030   r2[0] += 1.0/A*(1.0-1.0/A)* mr2;
00031   r2[1] += (1.0/(A*A) + (1+G1->xi)/2 *(1.0/Z-2.0/(A*Z)))* mr2;
00032   r2[2] += (1.0/(A*A) + (1-G1->xi)/2 *(1.0/N-2.0/(A*N)))* mr2;
00033 }
00034 
00035 
00036 static void tb_radii2(const SlaterDet* Q,
00037            const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00038            const Gaussian* G3, const Gaussian* G4, 
00039            const GaussianAux* X13, const GaussianAux* X24, 
00040            complex double r2[3])
00041 {       
00042   complex double mr2;
00043   int A=Q->A, Z=Q->Z, N=Q->N;
00044 
00045   mr2 = cvec3mult(X13->rho, X24->rho)*X13->Q*X24->Q;
00046 
00047   r2[0] += -2.0/(A*A)* mr2;
00048   r2[1] +=  2.0*(1.0/(A*A) - 
00049                  ((1+G1->xi)/2+(1+G2->xi)/2) *1.0/(A*Z))* mr2;
00050   r2[2] +=  2.0*(1.0/(A*A) - 
00051                  ((1-G1->xi)/2+(1-G2->xi)/2) *1.0/(A*N))* mr2;
00052 }

00054 
00055 void calcRadii2(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00056                 double* r2mass, double* r2proton, double* r2neutron)
00057 {
00058   double r2one[3], r2two[3];
00059   OneBodyOperator op_ob_radii2 = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: Q, me: ob_radii2};
00060   TwoBodyOperator op_tb_radii2 = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: Q, me: tb_radii2};
00061 
00062 
00063   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_radii2, r2one);
00064   calcSlaterDetTBME(Q, X, &op_tb_radii2, r2two);
00065 
00066   *r2mass = r2one[0] + r2two[0];
00067   *r2proton = r2one[1] + r2two[1];
00068   *r2neutron = r2one[2] + r2two[2];
00069 }
00070 
00071 
00072 void calcRadii2od(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00073                   const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00074                   complex double* r2mass, 
00075                   complex double* r2proton, complex double* r2neutron)
00076 {
00077   complex double r2one[3], r2two[3];
00078   OneBodyOperator op_ob_radii2 = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: Q, me: ob_radii2};
00079   TwoBodyOperator op_tb_radii2 = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: Q, me: tb_radii2};
00080 
00081 
00082   calcSlaterDetOBMEod(Q, Qp, X, &op_ob_radii2, r2one);
00083   calcSlaterDetTBMEod(Q, Qp, X, &op_tb_radii2, r2two);
00084 
00085   *r2mass = r2one[0] + r2two[0];
00086   *r2proton = r2one[1] + r2two[1];
00087   *r2neutron = r2one[2] + r2two[2];
00088 }
